bluej.codecoverage.utils

Class CoverageListener.Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • bluej.codecoverage.utils.CoverageListener.Handler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    CoverageListener

    private static class CoverageListener.Handler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Manages all interactions with the jacoco agent by sending requests and receiving responses from a local port.

    After receiving information from the agent, it marshals the data into a Serializable form, so it can be sent to different class loaders.
    Creation of the Serializable forms are handled through class to CoverageBridge.
